haxel.HxlQuake

type
class
This is a special effects utility class to help HxlGame do the 'quake' or screenshake effect.

Constructor

public new(Zoom : Int)
Constructor.

Instance Variables

private _intensity : Float

The intensity of the quake effect: a percentage of the screen's size.

private _timer : Float

Set to countdown the quake time.

private _zoom : Int

The game's level of zoom.

public x : Int

The amount of X distortion to apply to the screen.

public y : Int

The amount of Y distortion to apply to the screen.

Instance Methods

public start(?Intensity : Float, ?Duration : Float) : Void

parameters
Intensity Percentage of screen size representing the maximum distance that the screen can move during the 'quake'.
Duration The length in seconds that the "quake" should last.
Reset and trigger this special effect.

public stop() : Void

Stops this screen effect.

public update() : Void

Updates and/or animates this special effect.
